item.title: Visit-to-Vienna
item.description: Do some VDA with sights of Vienna, Austria. So what should I visit when staying in Vienna? I heard this question quite often when friends were visiting from different countries. My Answer was always, if you are only one or two days in Vienna, just talk a long walk in the city center and enjoy the flare of the city, since the most pretty buildings are around the city center and mostly in walking distance.
